subject: Re: [cc-community] [Clipart] In the interim...
body:
On Tue, 2007-05-08 at 13:12 -0700, Greg Bulmash wrote:
> Hi,
> 
> Longtime listener, first time caller.
> 
> Is it okay to submit caricatures of living people?
> 
> As an experiment, I had some artists draw some caricatures:
>    Paris Hilton
>    Rachel Ray
>    Lenin
>    Che
>    Whoopi Goldberg
>    George Clooney
> 
> Decided not to use them commercially and since they were works for hire, 
> I own the copyright.  I was going to dedicate them to the public domain 
> and upload them to OCL (about 10 in all) when I found it offline.

That is a good question. I'm cc'ing the cc-community list on this too
see thoughts. If you are interested, please hop over to that list.

cc-community people, this fellow is asking if it is ok to contribute
characters of famous people to the public domain. Any good sources for
this?

> So I might as well use this pause to ask if it's cool to upload them.
> 
> - Greg
> 
> 
> 
> 
> _______________________________________________
> clipart mailing list
> clipart@lists.freedesktop.org
> http://lists.freedesktop.org/mailman/listinfo/clipart
